question: The cabinet of which state in India has cleared a bill to enact the "Time-Bound Clearance Act" which shall ensure time-bound clearance of industrial licenses for investment projects?
explanation: Madhya Pradesh Cabinet has cleared a draft bill to enact Madhya Pradesh Time-Bound Clearance Act. This act will ensure time-bound clearance of industrial licenses for investment projects. It envisages that around 40 clearances and permissions pertaining to almost 10 state departments will have to be delivered within a fixed timeframe.
